generated_text:
- road: The image shows a cobblestone street with a white line marking the edge, indicating it is a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrians are walking on a paved area next to the road, which is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings with windows and commercial signs are visible in the background and along the street.
- vegetation: Trees with leaves are present along the sidewalk and street.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Several individuals are visible walking on the sidewalk and crossing the street.
- pole: A vertical pole with a traffic light is visible on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the image, near the traffic light pole.
- terrain: A small patch of dirt or gravel is visible near the curb on the left side of the image.
